page.title: 17The Corner Shop, Hampton
page.content: The Corner{Shop}was built in the 16th century and it has been a{grocery}shop ever since. It sells all kinds of food such as biscuits, cereal, tinned food, bread, cold cabinet food and lots more. We have all kinds of people old people, young people, tatty and tidy. The opening times of the shop are Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday 8.30am till 6.00pm and Wednesday 8.30am till 2.00pm.On Sunday we're closed all day. As well as selling food we do{sandwiches}hot and cold for{take away.}In the morning the workers from the Ring o' Bells Garage order lots of sandwiches. Oh, yes, and in the window of the Corner Shop there is a coffee grinder and many people come in for their{coffee;}some people want it ground others don't.
